channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

Display name: SecurityIdentitiesUserActions.ReadWrite.All

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 577a9874-89fd-4f24-9dbd-b5034d0ad23a
Display name: Container Registry Data Importer and Data Reader
Description: Provides the ability to import images into a registry through the registry import operation. Provides the ability to list repositories, view images and tags, get manifests, and pull images. Does not provide permissions for importing images through configuring registry transfer pipelines such as import and export pipelines. Does not provide permissions for importing through configuring Artifact Cache or Sync rules.
Link: https://management.azure.com/577a9874-89fd-4f24-9dbd-b5034d0ad23a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a35466a1-cfd6-450a-b35e-683fcdf30363
Display name: Azure Batch Service Orchestration Role
Description: Grants the required permissions to Azure Batch Resource Provider to manage compute and other backing resources in the subscription.
Link: https://management.azure.com/a35466a1-cfd6-450a-b35e-683fcdf30363?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 8c87871d-6201-42da-abb1-1c0c985ff71c
Display name: Microsoft PowerBI Tenant Operations Role
Description: Allows management of tenant operations
Link: https://management.azure.com/8c87871d-6201-42da-abb1-1c0c985ff71c?api-version=2022-04-01
